articles.title: Zimbabwean Jackie du Preez who played for South Africa dies at 77
articles.description: Du Preez played two Tests against Australia in the 1966-67 season | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content:
Jackie du Preez, the Zimbabwean who played two Tests for South Africa in the 1966-67 season, has died in Harare at the age of 77. Du Preez was suffering from a long-standing heart condition.
